column1: To test viral extractions for putative bacterial contamination, each DNA sample was assessed using the 16S 63F / 1087R primer pair following standard PCR protocols [ 6].

The PCRs included about 5ng of DNA extract, 15pmol of each forward primer U341F 5 - NNNNNNNNNNCCTAYGGGRBGCASCAG and reverse primer U806R 5 - NNNNNNNNNNGGACTACNNGGGTATCTAAT in a 20L volume of MyTaq buffer containing 1. 5 units MyTaq DNA polymerase ( Bioline) and 2L of BioStabII PCR Enhancer ( Sigma).
